title: Coronavirus: India 'super spreader' quarantines 40,000 people
description: A religious preacher in the northern state of Punjab who died of Covid-19 may have infected hundreds.
content:
Image copyrightGetty imagesImage caption
 Punjab has 30 confirmed cases of the virus
Indian authorities in the northern state of Punjab have quarantined around 40,000 residents from 20 villages following a Covid-19 outbreak linked to just one man.
